author: veithen
msg: Commented out code introduced in revision 680041 and breaking the build.

author: olamy
msg: add exclusion on velocity with groupId velocity to use velocity 1.5 with groupId org.apache.velocity

author: veithen
msg: Improved the transport test kit to allow testing the transport listener by sending messages through the corresponding transport sender. This allows to build unit tests that check the interoperability between senders and listeners. Implemented these tests for the JMS, VFS and HTTP transports. This provides regression tests for the JMS transport bugs corrected in revisions 680021 and 680023.
